Image:Ure.gifÚre is the name in Quenya of the thirty-sixth letter of the Tengwar alphabet. When used as a consonant it represents W.
column5: as seen as in the inscription on the Doors of Durin of Moria
column6: Yanta represents U. The Westron name for this letter is Au.See Westron Tengwar

The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme UR.
